creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Square of double complementary warp patterning with llama motif in red and yellow. Crocheted edging on one side, brown cording used to finish one side, bound in diamond patterned twining on one side, frayed on fourth side. It probably was a coca bag embellishment.
title: Fragment with Llamas
